text:
e="preserve">Air Astana is a government owned airline of Kazakhstan. It flies to domestic and international destinations. It's main airports are Almaty International Airport and Nursultan Nazarbayev International Airport. It was founded in October 2001 and started flights in 15 May 2002.
History.
In September 2002, Air Astana started flights between Nur-Sultan and Moscow and started daily flights between Almaty and Moscow.
